md:
giải nghĩa từ "odor" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

 Odor (noun)

* Meaning: a smell, especially an unpleasant one
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: The odor of the rotten fish filled the entire room.
* Related words: smell, scent, aroma, fragrance

 Odor (verb)

* Meaning: to give off an unpleasant smell
* Part of speech: verb
* Example sentence: The garbage odors the entire neighborhood.
* Related words: stink, reek, smell, emit

Odor (noun)

  • Meaning: a smell, especially an unpleasant one

  • Example sentence: The odor of the rotten fish filled the entire room.
  • Related words: smell, scent, aroma, fragrance

Odor (verb)

  • Example sentence: The garbage odors the entire neighborhood.
